title: Emperors Decent HD Watch Face
summary: Emperors is an Elegant Decent Style watch face for any Android Wear device.
description: Model NumberDW-A05CategoryDecentEmperors  is a  decent watch face for all smart watches (It has been tested on Moto 360, LG G Watch R and Sony Smart watch 3).it is available for all kind of watches including round and rectangle.it has following featuresFeatures:✔ Day, Date✔ 5 Beautiful Default Ambient Modes ✔ 1 Custom Ambient Modes✔ Unlimited Colors✔ Smooth & Tick Needles✔ Background EffectConfiguration:  ✔ choose colors✔ switch  between Tick & smooth needle style✔ set your favorite ambient mode ✔ show/hide date and day✔ on/off background effectFor Email support Contact us at  droiipd@gmail.comTip 1Now we support 280x280 and 320x320 square watchesTip 2✔ If the watch face is not shown on your watch after re-sync, try these steps:1. Disconnect devices (watch and phone)2. Uninstall the watch face3. Restart watch and connect device again4. Then finally install the watch faceTo install:1. After install run 'Resync app' on Android Wear App.2. Long press your android wear watch and choose Emperors Watch Face as your watch faceNotePlease, rate us positive if you like our watch faces! Don't give a bad rating too soon. If you experienced a problem, please, send us an email and we will be happy to answer it and fix an issue soon as possible.Compatible with Moto360, LG G Watch R, Sony smartwatches... (Note: You can do all the customization from the Our Mobile App, you can open our mobile app from you application menu)And that is not the end of it watch for the new customization options and features coming soon, and we'd love to hear from you what you would like to see on it!
descriptionHTML:
Model Number
DW-A05

Category
Decent

Emperors is a decent watch face for all smart watches (It has been tested on Moto 360, LG G Watch R and Sony Smart watch 3).it is available for all kind of watches including round and rectangle.it has following features

Features:
✔ Day, Date
✔ 5 Beautiful Default Ambient Modes
✔ 1 Custom Ambient Modes
✔ Unlimited Colors
✔ Smooth & Tick Needles
✔ Background Effect
Configuration:
✔ choose colors
✔ switch between Tick & smooth needle style
✔ set your favorite ambient mode
✔ show/hide date and day
✔ on/off background effect
For Email support Contact us at droiipd@gmail.com
Tip 1
Now we support 280x280 and 320x320 square watches
Tip 2
✔ If the watch face is not shown on your watch after re-sync, try these steps:
1. Disconnect devices (watch and phone)
2. Uninstall the watch face
3. Restart watch and connect device again
4. Then finally install the watch face
To install:
1. After install run 'Resync app' on Android Wear App.
2. Long press your android wear watch and choose Emperors Watch Face as your watch face
Note

Please, rate us positive if you like our watch faces! Don't give a bad rating too soon. If you experienced a problem, please, send us an email and we will be happy to answer it and fix an issue soon as possible.
Compatible with Moto360, LG G Watch R, Sony smartwatches...

(Note: You can do all the customization from the Our Mobile App, you can open our mobile app from you application menu)

And that is not the end of it watch for the new customization options and features coming soon, and we'd love to hear from you what you would like to see on it!
comments: Asus zenwatch 2 Not sending the faces I want to my zenwatch 2
Great customization My only issue is that the days on the date display are very difficult to read.  Bigger fonts or something would help
Decent & Too Much Cutomization Unlimited colors ... Tooo many custmization ,decent design,looking fab on my moto 360 . DroiipD Watch Faces are awesome ...
